events.message: The applicant submitted a complete mortgage loan application to secure financing for a new property purchase.
The application was categorised under mortgage loan products as it pertains to a house purchase.
A loan officer was assigned to manage the mortgage loan application and assist the applicant.
The loan officer completed an initial review of the documents and financial details submitted by the applicant.
Additional documents were requested to validate the applicant’s income and property details for underwriting.
The applicant provided the requested income statements, property appraisal report, and identification documents.
Credit history and scores were checked and found favorable for the mortgage loan application.
A risk assessment was performed evaluating the applicant’s financial stability and property valuation.
A mortgage loan offer including interest rate and repayment terms was presented to the applicant.
The applicant reviewed the offer and requested clarification on some repayment schedule details.
The application was escalated to the underwriting supervisor for approval of a custom repayment plan.
The mortgage loan was approved with adjusted repayment terms as requested by the applicant.
Mortgage funds were disbursed to the property seller’s account as per the purchase agreement.
A follow-up was conducted to ensure the applicant understood the mortgage terms and next steps.
The loan application process was officially closed after all funding and onboarding steps were completed.
